definition: to take a letter/to send word

letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: He asked the birds to take a message for his wife, but they all refused.
sentences.chinese: 他就请求鸟儿们给自己的妻子捎信，但是却被拒绝了。

sentences.english: I have sent ahead to her to tell her that you’ll soon be there.
sentences.chinese: 我已预先捎信给她，告诉她你们很快将到那里。

sentences.english: One day, YuLan her message, let her return home to have a look.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，玉兰娘家捎信来，让她回娘家看看。

sentences.english: She sent word that she would be late.
sentences.chinese: 她捎信来说她要晚些来。
